alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:57AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Putnam, central Defiance, Paulding, southeastern Henry and northeastern Van Wert Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 256 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from McComb to near Antwerp. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ottoville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for northeastern Indiana...and northwestern and west central Ohio.

area.areaDesc: Defiance; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert
